name: STONKS - EU + US edition
description:
STONKS (very very early accses!)

Stonks is an simulation/strategy game, where you have to trade stocks to make a profit! Its very simple, but if you have questions, just ask! 

Currently is only the EU edition playable!

*IMPORTANT* 
STONKS IS NOT AN GAME/SOFTWARE TO TRAIN THE STOCK MARKET! ITS JUST FOR FUN!
